snippet: The Santa Barbara County Sheriff’s Office followed a call from Elliot O. Rodger’s mother by visiting Mr. Rodger’s and determining that he was not an immediate threat. Three weeks later, he killed six people.
abstract: California lawmakers call for investigation of previous contact between Santa Barbara County Sheriff's Office and Elliot O Rodger, three weeks before he killed six college students and wounded 13 other people in shooting rampage; some call for wholesale changes to how police respond to calls indicating someone could be a threat to himself or to others.
lead_paragraph: The Santa Barbara County Sheriff’s Office followed a call from Elliot O. Rodger’s mother by visiting Mr. Rodger’s and determining that he was not an immediate threat. Three weeks later, he killed six people.

headline.main: After Deadly Rampage, Sheriff’s Office Faces Concerns About Conduct
headline.print_headline: After Deadly Rampage, Sheriff’s Office Faces Concerns About Conduct
